mapper.select: select boardno, uid, productno, btitle, bcontent, bdate, borgimg, bsaveimg, bimagtype from productreviews order by boardno desc
mapper.insert: insert into productreviews (boardno, uid, productno, btitle, bcontent, bdate, borgimg, bsaveimg, bimagtype) values (seq_boardno.nextval, #{uid}, #{productno}, #{btitle}, #{bcontent}, sysdate, #{borgimg}, #{bsaveimg}, #{bimagtype})
mapper.update: update productreviews set btitle=#{btitle}, bcontent=#{bcontent}, borgimg=#{borgimg}, bsaveimg=#{bsaveimg}, bimagtype=#{bimagtype} where boardno=#{boardno}
